channel.title: Java Not recognized as an internal or external command on a windows vista comp
channel.description:
Okay, well the problem is in the title I've done this before its just been around a year or so. I would look at the guide to making a private server but there's and error when i go to that page. So if anyone could help me on this please do so.
Thanks, Scully

item.title: Java Not recognized as an internal or external command on a windows vista comp
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Set your environmental variables.

About that…I’m really not sure how to do so.

Read full topic
item.source: Java Not recognized as an internal or external command on a windows vista comp
